mapper.sql: MSQ_ID, ZZJG_ID, MSQ_NAME, MSQ_ADDTIME, MSQ_MSG_IDS, MSQ_MSG_NAMES, MSQ_MSSJ, MSQ_MSDD, MSQ_MSLB, MSQ_DELFLAG
mapper.select:
select
from MSQ where MSQ_DELFLAG = 1 and MSQ_MSG_NAMES not like '%已全部删除%'
and MSQ_NAME like '%${msqName}%'
and ZZJG_ID like '%${zzjgId}%'

select * from (select top ${currentPageSize} * from (select top(${pageNum}*${pageSize}) * from MSQ T where MSQ_DELFLAG = 1 and ZZJG_ID = #{zzjgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and MSQ_NAME like '%${msqName}%'
and MSQ_MSLB like '%${msqMslb}%'
order by T.MSQ_ADDTIME desc ) as t1 order by MSQ_ADDTIME asc) as t2 order by MSQ_ADDTIME desc
mapper.insert: insert into MSQ (MSQ_ID, ZZJG_ID, MSQ_NAME, MSQ_ADDTIME, MSQ_MSG_IDS, MSQ_MSG_NAMES, MSQ_MSSJ, MSQ_MSDD, MSQ_MSLB, MSQ_DELFLAG) values (#{msqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zzjgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msqName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msqAddtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{msqMsgIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msqMsgNames,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msqMssj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msqMsdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msqMslb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msqDelflag,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into MSQ
MSQ_ID,
ZZJG_ID,
MSQ_NAME,
MSQ_ADDTIME,
MSQ_MSG_IDS,
MSQ_MSG_NAMES,
MSQ_MSSJ,
MSQ_MSDD,
MSQ_MSLB,
MSQ_DELFLAG,
#{msqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{zzjgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{msqName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{msqAddtime,jdbcType=DATE},
#{msqMsgIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{msqMsgNames,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{msqMssj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{msqMsdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{msqMslb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{msqDelflag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update MSQ
ZZJG_ID = #{zzjgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MSQ_NAME = #{msqName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MSQ_ADDTIME = #{msqAddtime,jdbcType=DATE},
MSQ_MSG_IDS = #{msqMsgIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MSQ_MSG_NAMES = #{msqMsgNames,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MSQ_MSSJ = #{msqMssj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MSQ_MSDD = #{msqMsdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MSQ_MSLB = #{msqMslb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MSQ_DELFLAG = #{msqDelflag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where MSQ_ID = #{msqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update MSQ set ZZJG_ID = #{zzjgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MSQ_NAME = #{msqName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MSQ_ADDTIME = #{msqAddtime,jdbcType=DATE}, MSQ_MSG_IDS = #{msqMsgIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MSQ_MSG_NAMES = #{msqMsgNames,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MSQ_MSSJ = #{msqMssj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MSQ_MSDD = #{msqMsdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MSQ_MSLB = #{msqMslb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MSQ_DELFLAG = #{msqDelflag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where MSQ_ID = #{msqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
